name: StatinsAllergySCT
title: Statins Allergy SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes that may be returned by the FHIR AllergyIntolerance resource that would indicate allergy or intolerance to statins),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:),(Inclusion Criteria: (1) The concept of statins as a class (2) the concept of allergy or intolerance to statins as a class (3) the concept of individual statins (4) the concept of allergy or intolerance to individual statins),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
